thread.title: Watch Mac DeMarco Play “This Old Dog” At Dog Grooming Parlour
thread.title_full: Watch Mac DeMarco Play “This Old Dog” At Dog Grooming Parlour

author: Stereogum
title: Watch Mac DeMarco Play “This Old Dog” At Dog Grooming Parlour
text: Mac DeMarco: a silly man! Crack Magazine recently invited the musician to a grooming parlour where he performed his song " This Old Dog " for -- you guessed it! -- a bunch of dogs. DeMarco's new album is due out in May by way of Captured Tracks. Watch him sing to some doggies below. More »
